item.text: The Lord’s message came to me:

“<st data-num="01121" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="01696" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> your <st data-num="01121 05971">people</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them, ‘<st data-num="03588" class="">Suppose</st> I <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> a <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>, and the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> from their <st data-num="07097" class="">borders</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">make</st> him their <st data-num="06822" class="">watchman</st>.

He <st data-num="07200" class="">sees</st> the <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>, <st data-num="08628" class="">blows</st> the <st data-num="07782" class="">trumpet</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="02094" class="">warns</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>,<n id="2" />

but there is <st data-num="08085" class="">one</st> who <st data-num="08085" class="">hears</st> the <st data-num="06963" class="">sound</st> of the <st data-num="07782" class="">trumpet</st> yet does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02094" class="">heed the warning</st>. Then the <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">comes</st> and <st data-num="03947" class="">sweeps</st> him <st data-num="03947" class="">away</st>. He will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="07218" class="">responsible</st> for his own <st data-num="01818" class="">death</st>.<n id="1" />

He <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> the <st data-num="06963" class="">sound</st> of the <st data-num="07782" class="">trumpet</st> but did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02094" class="">heed the warning</st>, so he <st data-num="01961" class="">is</st> responsible for <st data-num="01818" class="">himself</st>.<n id="1" /> If <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> had <st data-num="02094" class="">heeded the warning</st>, he would have <st data-num="04422" class="">saved</st> his <st data-num="05315" class="">life</st>.

But suppose the watchman sees the sword coming and does not blow the trumpet to warn the people. Then the sword comes and takes one of their lives. He is swept away for his iniquity, but I will hold the watchman accountable for that person’s death.’
“As for you, son of man, I have made you a watchman for the house of Israel. Whenever you hear a word from my mouth, you must warn them on my behalf.

When I <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st> to the <st data-num="07563" class="">wicked</st>, ‘O <st data-num="07563" class="">wicked man</st>, you must <st data-num="04191" class="">certainly</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>,’<n id="1" /> and you do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01696 02094">warn</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="07563" class="">wicked</st> about his <st data-num="01870" class="">behavior</st>,<n id="3" /> the <st data-num="01931 07563">wicked man</st> will <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> for his <st data-num="05771" class="">iniquity</st>, but I will <st data-num="01245" class="">hold</st> you <st data-num="03027" class="">accountable</st> for his <st data-num="01818" class="">death</st>.<n id="4" />
But if you warn the wicked man to change his behavior, and he refuses to change, he will die for his iniquity, but you have saved your own life.

“And you, son of man, say to the house of Israel, ‘This is what you have said: “Our rebellious acts and our sins have caught up with us, and we are wasting away because of them. How then can we live?”’

Say to them, ‘As surely as I live, declares the Sovereign Lord, I take no pleasure in the death of the wicked, but prefer that the wicked change his behavior and live. Turn back, turn back from your evil deeds! Why should you die, O house of Israel?’

“And you, son of man, say to your people, ‘The righteousness of the righteous will not deliver him if he rebels. As for the wicked, his wickedness will not make him stumble if he turns from it. The righteous will not be able to live by his righteousness if he sins.’

Suppose I <st data-num="0559" class="">tell</st> the <st data-num="06662">righteous</st> that he will <st data-num="02421" class="">certainly</st> <st data-num="02421" class="">live</st>, but <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> <st data-num="0982" class="">becomes confident</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">in</st> his <st data-num="06666" class="">righteousness</st> and <st data-num="06213" class="">commits</st> <st data-num="05766" class="">iniquity</st>. <st data-num="03605 03808">None</st> of his <st data-num="06666" class="">righteous deeds</st> will be <st data-num="02142" class="">remembered</st>; because of the <st data-num="05766 0834">iniquity</st> he has <st data-num="06213" class="">committed</st> he will <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>.

Suppose I <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st> to the <st data-num="07563" class="">wicked</st>, ‘You must <st data-num="04191" class="">certainly</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">die,’</st> but he <st data-num="07725" class="">turns</st> from his <st data-num="02403" class="">sin</st> and <st data-num="06213" class="">does</st> <st data-num="04941 06666">what is</st> <st data-num="04941" class="">just</st> and <st data-num="06666" class="">right</st>.

<st data-num="07563" class="">He</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07725" class="">returns</st> <st data-num="02258" class="">what was taken in pledge</st>, <st data-num="07999" class="">pays back</st> <st data-num="01500" class="">what</st> he <st data-num="01500" class="">has stolen</st>, and <st data-num="01980" class="">follows</st> the <st data-num="02708" class="">statutes</st> that give <st data-num="02416" class="">life</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="06213" class="">committing</st> <st data-num="01115" class="">no</st> <st data-num="05766" class="">iniquity</st>. He will <st data-num="02421" class="">certainly</st> <st data-num="02421" class="">live</st>—he will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>.
None of the sins he has committed will be counted against him. He has done what is just and right; he will certainly live.
“Yet your people say, ‘The behavior of the Lord is not right,’ when it is their behavior that is not right.

When a <st data-num="06662" class="">righteous man</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">turns</st> from his <st data-num="06666" class="">godliness</st> and <st data-num="06213" class="">commits</st> <st data-num="05766" class="">iniquity</st>, he will <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> for it.

When the <st data-num="07563" class="">wicked</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">turns</st> from his <st data-num="07564" class="">sin</st> and <st data-num="06213" class="">does</st> <st data-num="04941 06666">what is</st> <st data-num="04941" class="">just</st> and <st data-num="06666" class="">right</st>, <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> will <st data-num="02421" class="">live</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">because of</st> it.
Yet you say, ‘The behavior of the Lord is not right.’ House of Israel, I will judge each of you according to his behavior.”
In the twelfth year of our exile, in the tenth month, on the fifth of the month, a refugee came to me from Jerusalem saying, “The city has been defeated!”

Now the hand of the Lord had been on me the evening before the refugee reached me, but the Lord opened my mouth by the time the refugee arrived in the morning; he opened my mouth and I was able to speak once more.
The Lord’s message came to me:

“<st data-num="01121" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>, the ones <st data-num="03427" class="">living</st> in <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="02723" class="">ruins</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="0127" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> are <st data-num="0559 0559">saying</st>, ‘<st data-num="085" class="">Abraham</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> only <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> man, yet he <st data-num="03423" class="">possessed</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>, but <st data-num="0587" class="">we</st> are <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st>; surely the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> has been <st data-num="05414" class="">given</st> to us for a <st data-num="04181" class="">possession</st>.’<n id="1" />
Therefore say to them, ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: You eat the meat with the blood still in it, pray to your idols, and shed blood. Do you really think you will possess the land?
You rely on your swords and commit abominable deeds; each of you defiles his neighbor’s wife. Will you possess the land?’

“This is what you must say to them, ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: As surely as I live, those living in the ruins will die by the sword, those in the open field I will give to the wild beasts for food, and those who are in the strongholds and caves will die of disease.

I will <st data-num="05414" class="">turn</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> into a <st data-num="08077" class="">desolate</st> <st data-num="04923" class="">ruin</st>; her <st data-num="05797" class="">confident</st> <st data-num="01347" class="">pride</st> will <st data-num="07673" class="">come to an end</st>. The <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> will <st data-num="08074" class="">be</st> so <st data-num="08074" class="">desolate</st> <st data-num="0369" class="">no one</st> will <st data-num="05674" class="">pass through</st> them.
Then they will know that I am the Lord when I turn the land into a desolate ruin because of all the abominable deeds they have committed.’
“But as for you, son of man, your people (who are talking about you by the walls and at the doors of the houses) say to one another, ‘Come hear the word that comes from the Lord.’

They <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you <st data-num="03996" class="">in</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">crowds</st>,<n id="1" /> and they <st data-num="03427" class="">sit</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">in front of</st> you as<n id="2" /> my <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>. They <st data-num="08085" class="">hear</st> your <st data-num="01697" class="">words</st>, but do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">obey</st><n id="3" /> them. <st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> <st data-num="06310 06213">talk</st> <st data-num="05690" class="">lustfully</st>,<n id="4" /> and their <st data-num="03820" class="">heart</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">is set</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">on</st><n id="5" /> their own <st data-num="01215" class="">advantage</st>.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="02005" class="">Realize</st><n id="1" /> that to them you are like a <st data-num="05690" class="">sensual</st> <st data-num="07892" class="">song</st>, a <st data-num="03303" class="">beautiful</st> <st data-num="06963" class="">voice</st>, and <st data-num="02895" class="">skilled</st> <st data-num="05059" class="">musician</st>.<n id="2" /> They <st data-num="08085" class="">hear</st> your <st data-num="01697" class="">words</st>, but they do <st data-num="0369" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">obey</st> them.<n id="3" />
When all this comes true—and it certainly will—then they will know that a prophet was among them.”
